programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: Lili and the others reach Floor 27, where Bors had last seen Bell. However, only the gruesome aftermath of battle greeted them there. While Bell and Ryu run low on supplies and struggle to keep themselves alive on the deep floors, Ryu recalls the Astraea Familia, who was set on pursuing "justice". She begins to wonder what the right thing to do is.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: After being saved by the Xenos rescue party consisting of Tsubaki and Anya, Lili and the others are ready to proceed to the deep floors. Although their path is much more treacherous than they could have imagined, the adventurers are determined to descend the abyss for the sake of Bell. On the other hand, Bell and Ryu make their way out of the deep floors. Ryu is surprised at Bell's rapid growth after heeding her advice. However, they still do not see the light at the end of their path...

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: The Colosseum is a place on Floor 37, or the White Palace, where monsters are spawned without limit and will fight till the end of their lives. It is where even the Loki Familia dare not intrude. However, Bell and Ryu have to cross the arena to carve a path to the surface. With the risk of getting swarmed by monsters the moment they're found, Bell and Ryu tread carefully.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: The Astraea Familia group in Labyrinth City Orario advocated "justice". They helped the less fortunate and suppressed evil, all in the name of pursuing "justice". They were the only faction to accept and nurture Ryu, thus becoming her stronghold. All until the dungeon's darkness consumed them, their names fading away along with their short-lived history, leaving Ryu Lion alone.

programme.title: CARDFIGHT!! VANGUARD Divinez
programme.desc: Right as it seems that everything will return to Zero, the seventh Fated One's card that Hikari brought saves Akina from his pinch! Can the future actually be changed!?

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: After getting lost, Mitsumi is approached by Shima, a boy in the same school uniform.

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Sariphi succeeds in her first step to becoming queen. A young human assassin intrudes the palace. Sariphi rushes to the prison where the assassin is being restrained and gets a shock.

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Unconvinced that Sariphi was selected to become the demonkind's queen, Ilya abducts Sariphi. Leonhart and Bennu chase after Ilya while riding on Leonhart's holy beast, Gwiber.

programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND
programme.desc: Emma and Ray are in despair over the loss of Norman, who decided to be shipped out instead of escaping with the rest. It seems that they've finally given up on the escape, but…

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD]
programme.desc: Knowing that all the rumors are conntected, Iroha decides to reply the mysterious thread of messages she has been receiving. The sender invites Iroha to the Loner's Horizon.

programme.desc: Ai chose to erase herself to set Sana free. The destruction of the Loner's Horizon throws Alina into a rage while she starts attacking Iroha and the girls relentlessly.

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Aoi Takamoto, a surgeon, dies in a plane crash and reincarnates into her previous life, where she died as Elise, an evil empress. While Elise is surprised, her maid and family are puzzled.

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: To avoid tragedies in the future, Elise decides to break off her engagement with Crown Prince Linden and become a doctor. Instead of fulfilling her wish, Emperor Minchester makes a wager.

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Hiding her identity, Elise joins Theresa Hospital as an apprentice, only to be treated coldly. Unfazed, Elise uses her skills to treat the patients. Meanwhile, people doubt Elise's talent…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise gains recognition thanks to her medical skills. A severely ill patient is brought into Theresa Hospital. The mysterious young man who came along seems to be very interested in Elise…?

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise receives a recommendation to take the doctor license examination. While Elise's journey to becoming a doctor is smooth, Minchester and Minister Bent have something in place for her…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise reunites with her love rival, Julienne, at Minchester's birthday celebration. While Elise attempt to reconcile with Julienne, a shocking announcement from Minchester awaits...

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise saves a patient's life during the birthday celebration. She is arrested for performing a treatment no one has done in the Empire. Meanwhile, Minchester tasks Graham to investigate…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Graham learns of Elise's true identity. When Elise visits Graham's house in attempt to reconcile, they encounter an emergency involving an unknown disease. The two geniuses join hands…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Graham learns of Elise's true identity. When Elise visits Graham's house in attempt to reconcile, they encounter an emergency involving an unknown disease. The two geniuses join hands…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise is staying over at the Childe household, the family she was at odds with in her past life. Julienne expresses her admiration for Elise as they both open up to each other.

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Ron suddenly invites Elise out. In the midst of their dream-like date, they are embroiled in an incident. While they grow closer over the incident, Ron has something on his mind…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: At the award ceremony for the Medal of the Imperial Rose, Minchester collapses. Elise tries to find out the cause, but fails. Meanwhile, rumors of an attempted murder on the king spreads…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise puts in her utmost effort to prevent tragedy. The exam begins. After going through everything, Elise gains admiration from many, solidifying her conviction on her way of living.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: Lili and the others reach Floor 27, where Bors had last seen Bell. However, only the gruesome aftermath of battle greeted them there. While Bell and Ryu run low on supplies and struggle to keep themselves alive on the deep floors, Ryu recalls the Astraea Familia, who was set on pursuing "justice". She begins to wonder what the right thing to do is.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: After being saved by the Xenos rescue party consisting of Tsubaki and Anya, Lili and the others are ready to proceed to the deep floors. Although their path is much more treacherous than they could have imagined, the adventurers are determined to descend the abyss for the sake of Bell. On the other hand, Bell and Ryu make their way out of the deep floors. Ryu is surprised at Bell's rapid growth after heeding her advice. However, they still do not see the light at the end of their path...

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: The Colosseum is a place on Floor 37, or the White Palace, where monsters are spawned without limit and will fight till the end of their lives. It is where even the Loki Familia dare not intrude. However, Bell and Ryu have to cross the arena to carve a path to the surface. With the risk of getting swarmed by monsters the moment they're found, Bell and Ryu tread carefully.

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: The Astraea Familia group in Labyrinth City Orario advocated "justice". They helped the less fortunate and suppressed evil, all in the name of pursuing "justice". They were the only faction to accept and nurture Ryu, thus becoming her stronghold. All until the dungeon's darkness consumed them, their names fading away along with their short-lived history, leaving Ryu Lion alone.

programme.title: CARDFIGHT!! VANGUARD Divinez
programme.desc: Right as it seems that everything will return to Zero, the seventh Fated One's card that Hikari brought saves Akina from his pinch! Can the future actually be changed!?

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise is staying over at the Childe household, the family she was at odds with in her past life. Julienne expresses her admiration for Elise as they both open up to each other.

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Ron suddenly invites Elise out. In the midst of their dream-like date, they are embroiled in an incident. While they grow closer over the incident, Ron has something on his mind…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: At the award ceremony for the Medal of the Imperial Rose, Minchester collapses. Elise tries to find out the cause, but fails. Meanwhile, rumors of an attempted murder on the king spreads…

programme.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
programme.desc: Elise puts in her utmost effort to prevent tragedy. The exam begins. After going through everything, Elise gains admiration from many, solidifying her conviction on her way of living.

programme.title: I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills
programme.desc: Al meets Linea, a girl who had approached the guild to investigate her hometown of Gal, as she sensed something was amiss. Al immediately sets out for Gal, while Ruri and Helen follow behind him. Upon their arrival at the town of Gal, it was evident that something was up with the place. What exactly happened in the town?

programme.title: I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills
programme.desc: While on the way home after selling his harvest, Al saves Yuria, the Demon King's daughter. She tells him that she hopes that he can save the demons. Al quickly heads to the Demon Realm to find out what had happened. Upon arrival, he meets his mother and Volpe Dohma, Yuria's babysitter. Al is shocked to see his mother there, but something seems amiss about her…

programme.title: Grand Designs: House Of The Year S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: This series follows the Royal Institute of British Architecture's closely fought competition as it searches for the best new home in Britain. Presented by Kevin McCloud, with Michelle Ogundehin and Damion Burrows, we meet the owners and architects of the nominated buildings and explore each house's special qualities, whether that's clever craftsmanship, innovative use of materials or just daring to be different.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation - EP 8
programme.desc: Using props as clues, Kim plays a guessing game with Yoyo and Yaya about famous fairy tale and nursery rhyme siblings. Why segment - Why is my sister-brother so annoying.? Yoyo and Yaya get into a little argument and end up accusing each other of being annoying. Kim intervenes and helps them resolve their sibling rivalry and differences.

programme.title: In Our House S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: IN OUR HOUSE is full of surprises and is more interactive and energetic than you have ever seen before. In an entertaining mix of song, dance, music and drama, join the wacky hosts as they introduce the LETTERS AND NUMBERS OF THE DAY and the adventures that they encounter.

programme.title: The Big Q S3 - EP 9
programme.desc: The Big Q S3 - EP 9

programme.title: Super Rover & Friends - EP 18
programme.desc: Mrs Lee has traveled the world and now she is going to make her most ambitious step of going to the moon. Meanwhile, Rover and Jinxy show Vicky how to tell time by looking at her shadow.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories - EP 79
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Minibods - EP 29
programme.desc: Bubbles wants to win a football game but she needs to learn how to play fairly.

programme.title: Minibods - EP 31
programme.desc: Fuse discovers a spider in his gym and fun follows as it spins webs everywhere!

programme.title: The Great Warrior Wall - EP 25
programme.desc: This exciting series follows the life of Seya Wolf on his quest to become a hero. On his way, he encounters friends that accompany him on his journey, and foes who force him into battles.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys: The Series S25 - EP 39
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever for Ash, Goh, and Chloe as they advance toward their goals! As the Pokemon World Coronation Series tournament heats up, intensive training is in store for Ash, Pikachu, and their Pokemon friends.

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher - EP 7
programme.desc: In wrestling class Coach teaches the class about being a Face or a Heel. They must all decide what they will be. At school, Iz tries out being bad while Bob is desperate to be good. It all goes horribly wrong and they end up in the principal's office!

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S29 - EP 20
programme.desc: When an army of powerful alien beings are unleashed on Earth, threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the pre-historic power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven Ares - EP 14
programme.desc: When an elite group of soccer players split up to join teams across the country, the group's forward joins an underdog team from a remote island to help it achieve victory in a youth tournament.

programme.title: Ultraman Z - EP 8
programme.desc: Ultraman Z, the newest addition to the Intergalactic Defense Force, battles with evil forces that spread across the universe. He goes after the monster Genegarg to save Earth from destruction.

programme.title: Rise Of The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers go on adventures where they end up tapping into mystic ninja powers.

programme.title: Danger Mouse S1 - EP 43
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of secret agent Danger Mouse and his sidekick Penfold.

programme.title: The Deep S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Miniforce X[S2]- EP 11
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) The Miniforce fight against Villains threatening the Earth! Our heroes Volt, Max, Sammy and Lucy come back with upgraded X-power!

programme.title: Groom My Room - EP 9
programme.desc: She's not a girl, not yet a woman. After many years of sharing a bedroom with her younger brother, Tabitha is finally getting the bedroom to herself. It's a major step for her in growing up, but, she has absolutely no idea what to do. So Groom my Room comes to the rescue. With the interior designer's help, Tabby sets her mind on a hotel-resort like room because it would look more stylish and sophisticated. But she has never done anything remotely close to making over a room by herself before.

programme.title: Monster Jam - EP 3
programme.desc: Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: World Sailing Show - EP 3
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled.

programme.title: Survivor 46 - EP 6
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23 - EP 5
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 854
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 34
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 - EP 8
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Brahms: The Boy II
programme.desc: The story is about a family moves to a house in a countryside after a son (Jude) and mother (Liza) both traumatised from an unexpected burglary. Jude finds a dirty, dusty porcelain doll and calls it Brahms. Everything then change in a sinister way because of the doll.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: The Team slips into the world of E-Sports when they learn that a Team Manager is exploiting young gamers by isolating them from their families by promising them the dream of being E-Sports legend

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Heartbroken and disillusioned, junior doctor Ruby Walker ditches her life in the UK for a fresh start in exotic South India. But when she arrives at the Good Karma Hospital, nothing is quite what she expected, not least her eccentric new boss, Lydia Fonseca.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23 - EP 6
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme - EP 2
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: Penguins: Meet The Family
programme.desc: A stunning celebration of an iconic bird. Travelling all around the southern hemisphere, this special programme sets out to introduce the whole remarkable penguin family. Most people imagine penguins huddled in a snowy world, but there's much more to them than that. Penguins can be found in deserts, tropical jungles and even bustling cities. From tiny fairy penguins - just 30 centimetres high - to giant emperors, the penguin extended family is full of surprises.

programme.title: Make It Count - EP 10
programme.desc: Joakim and Charmian go to the world class Singapore Zoo to hunt down Math in Nature. They go in search of plants that divide, count and add (though not out loud), wild dogs and lionesses that use Math to help them decide to hunt or fight and cicadas that count on prime numbers to avoid predators. There's even a mathematical explanation to why ants are strong, polar bears are big and elephants live so long. Mother Nature is a master mathematician. And we have the proof!

programme.desc: (R) Singaporeans are generally perceived as less eco-conscious than our neighbours. However, despite our blatant consumerism, are we really so backward when it comes to saving the Earth? Recently, many countries have begun "zero waste" initiatives, but are we prepared to implement this lifestyle change?

programme.title: The Joymakers - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Japan is an affluent society, which is why the issue of poverty often overlooked. In Osaka, there was an unfortunate incident where a mother and child starved to death at home. Determined to help the poor, a few monks decided to establish an anti-poverty organization that distributes temple offerings as gifts to families-in-need, providing them hope and bringing joy.

programme.title: Never Twice - EP 4
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Du Daoxi urges her daughter Luo Haili to work harder so as to prevent Haijun from taking over the company. However, Chairman Luo favours his grandson Haijun over his granddaughter Haili. Haili is very unhappy about it.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: The Happiest Girl In The World
programme.desc: Delia, an 18-year-old girl from a small Romanian town learns that she has won a car in a contest, and she travels to Bucharest with her parents to claim it. All goes well, until Delia and her family starts to disagree on what to do with the car.

programme.title: Tuesday Club
programme.desc: Karin's world crumbles on her 40th anniversary when she discovers her husband’s infidelity. Seeking solace in a cooking class with renowned chef Henrik, she rediscovers her lifelong passions and learns that it is never too late to follow her dreams.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Terri
programme.desc: Terri is an often bullied, overweight teen. When he decides to stop trying in school, the garrulous principal, Fitzgerald, becomes concerned. However, what was meant to be a counselling course for Terri becomes a journey of healing for both protagonists.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: An uplifting tale of Kacper, a charismatic high school history teacher who hides his progressing blindness from everyone around him to fulfil his educational duties. His methods are unorthodox, sometimes hilarious, and devilishly effective.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: An uplifting tale of Kacper, a charismatic high school history teacher who hides his progressing blindness from everyone around him to fulfil his educational duties. His methods are unorthodox, sometimes hilarious, and devilishly effective.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the school’s notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre
programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brother’s mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brother’s death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: OSOM: Don't Get Caught
programme.desc: 2 child beggars struggle to achieve their daily quota (kutipan) so they had to pickpocket bystanders or they’ll be punished by their master due to “tak cukup quota”.

programme.title: The Breach
programme.desc: A fatal car crash shudders a crisis-torn family. Completely lost and shaken to the core by his wife’s death, the husband undertakes his own investigation and learns the shattering truth about his spouse’s genuine woes and longings.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Nina is twelve and her world is falling apart: her parents' marriage has broken down and they are getting a divorce. She takes refuge in competitive swimming but when she is unable to attend a competition, she makes a radical move.

programme.title: Playmaker

programme.desc: After accidentally killing a man she wrongly thought was about to attack her, a traumatised Sarah Kohr is sent away on leave to forget the ordeal. But when she witnesses a man being shot at the airport, she has to help his son flee from the unknown killer.

programme.desc: After narrowly escaping from a lab technician who was found guilty of the murder of his lab assistant, Inspector Sarah Kohr has to track him down. But the killer is wanted by another assassin, linked to a scandal far greater than Sarah imagined.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.desc: Young Jette flies to Iceland to settle her aunt Rosalie’s ashes in its final resting place. Armed only with Rosalie’s diary, she learns about her aunt’s hidden life of love and survival. Unbeknownst to Jette, her own love story is about to begin too!

programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: A Summer in Iceland

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.desc: Lisa Hellman falls in love with Catalan bank heir Emilio, but soon realises that both their families are fundamentally incompatible. His family’s wealth and conservatism make Lisa rethink marriage, and she starts to develop feelings for Emilio’s cousin, Pablo.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Osaka
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - The Garden Route
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - Miracle On Ice Flag
programme.desc: A photo shows the American flag draped around goalie Jim Craig after the U.S. hockey team’s Olympic miracle win in 1980. But where is it now? Untangle conflicting stories about its whereabouts with Barrows and Gardner, and Jim Craig himself.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - Gehrig's Bat, Gibson's Ball
programme.desc: Travel to Los Angeles, hot on the trail of the home run ball hit by Kirk Gibson in the 1988 World Series. Then, put a rare bat to the test and discover if it did indeed see action in the hands of Yankee legend Lou Gehrig.

programme.title: David Beckham: Infamous
programme.desc: David Beckham, a household name, footballing icon and at one point the most hated man in England. A comprehensive look at David Beckhams footballing career focusing on his England redemption, World Cup dreams, trial by media and becoming brand Becks.

programme.title: Chadwick Boseman: The King
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman’s performances elevated the biographical genre, he became the definition of bringing heroes to life. He was always acting, always writing, always kind. He not only played a superhero. He became a hero.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Rainforest
programme.desc: Rainforests cover just six percent of Earth's surface yet contain almost half of the world's plants and animals. With a diversity of mammals, birds, and bugs unrivaled almost anywhere in the world, Panama's Barro Colorado Island is the perfect microcosm of nature. Every year, passionate and dedicated scientists gather to this oasis of life, scaling the treetops, from canopy to forest floor, in an attempt to unlock the secrets of the rainforest. Follow them as they explore how life thrives in one of the most complex habitats on Earth.

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Seeing In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Giant Wetapunga Wild Work
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, the Ungulate team prepare for a birth, we meet one of the longest living animals and Auckland Zoo helps to save an endangered giant.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Baby Giraffe
programme.desc: Baby Giraffe meets the herd, the Zoo’s five otter brothers are on the move and the ectotherm team search for a hidden for a treasure.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Saving The Kakapo
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, it's an anxious time for Zoo vets as they work to save one of the most endangered birds on the planet, and the ectotherm team are on a mission in the wild South Island.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - White Rhino Birth
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, the Zoo welcomes two crocodiles to the Swamp Forest, the new South East Asia habitat opens and the team prepare for the birth of a baby southern white rhino.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP9
programme.desc: Believe it or not there are over 70,000 Bosnian people who migrated to St Louis during the Bosnian war. They love their new country but they have brought some customs which Americans have found to be a little odd but their food is hearty delicious.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP10
programme.desc: Over the many years of colonisation America has burrowed their fare from the immigrants that settled here. Now there is a cuisine called 'American' and it’s delicious.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP11
programme.desc: It’s always so intriguing to discover the roots of a culture. We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.It’s always so intriguing to discover the roots of a culture. We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP12
programme.desc: This moving trend is sweeping states and is taking the food to the people. We get on the bandwagon and taste the food.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Tokyo
programme.desc: In the vast urban sprawl of Tokyo, Adam Liaw explores a food culture that not only sustains the `salaryman' workers in style but retains culinary traditions.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Tokyo Part 2
programme.desc: Adam Liaw checks out the restaurants of food-crazy Tokyo and taste's some interesting dishes including Yakitori made from the reproductive organs of chickens.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyoto
programme.desc: Adam meets a tea master, a Maiko, and a Michelin chef who turns risotto into sushi in the thriving traditional culture of Kyoto.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Osaka
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - The Garden Route
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Cape Town Spice
programme.desc: Warren has arrived into Cape Town. This won’t be your average culinary exploration of a city; Warren has dedicated the entire episode to diving into a specific style of South African cooking known as ‘Cape Malay’.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Kruger Safari
programme.desc: Warren commences his second Food Trail of South Africa in the world famous Kruger National Park and surrounds.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Tasting Johannesburg
programme.desc: Johannesburg - the gateway city to exploring South Africa! In this episode Warren indulges in the vibrant international flavours and surrounds of the Sandton neighbourhood, loved by locals and visitors alike.

programme.title: Aerial Ireland
programme.desc: Take a cross-country flight over the natural wonders and ancient ruins of the Emerald Isle. From the Neolithic tombs of the Celtic era to the medieval castles of the Vikings, discover the sites, people, and milestones that make this land unique.

programme.title: Aerial New Zealand
programme.desc: Take an epic voyage over this remote island nation. From snow-capped mountains and sandy beaches to glacier carved parks and crater lakes, find out what makes this small country extraordinary.

programme.title: Carrier At War: The USs Enterprise
programme.desc: A look at what life is like aboard the floating city of the USS Enterprise in the Persian Gulf.

programme.title: Carrier At War: The USs Enterprise
programme.desc: A look at what life is like aboard the floating city of the USS Enterprise in the Persian Gulf.

programme.title: Carriers At War - Strike Force Arabian Gulf
programme.desc: At more than three football fields long, the USS George H.W. Bush can carry 70 aircraft armed and ready for battle. Join the crew on a 2017 mission to the Arabian Gulf, as they prepare to provide air support to allied forces fighting on the ground.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum - EP1
programme.desc: We follow the charming story of a hand-made children’s toy - Pumpie the elephant. Pumpie was made a hundred years ago by the Cattley family in west London but now suffers from major moth damage over the years and needs urgent restoration.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum - EP2
programme.desc: Alice and her team unframe and scan a gallery of 500-year-old masterpieces: Raphael’s cartoons which are so rare and so beautiful that they are now considered works of art in their own right.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Biosphere
programme.desc: Edge of Existence examines existential threats to the worlds biosphere and what it means for the future of the planet, and Aotearoa.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Bio-Threats
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of... - Brittany Murphy

programme.title: America's National Parks At 100
programme.desc: The National Park Service has been active for over a century preserving and protecting over 400 units across America, from the wild and natural to the man-made and historic. Take a tour through iconic Yellowstone and the Grand Canyon and discover smaller, hidden treasures throughout the country.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Deserts
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee introduces us to the incredible animals living in one of the world’s toughest places, deserts. With ground temperatures exceeding 70 degrees Celsius, to survive here creatures have developed some ingenious adaptations.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Rainforests

programme.title: America's National Parks At 100
programme.desc: The National Park Service has been active for over a century preserving and protecting over 400 units across America, from the wild and natural to the man-made and historic. Take a tour through iconic Yellowstone and the Grand Canyon and discover smaller, hidden treasures throughout the country.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Rivalry Time
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Deserts
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee introduces us to the incredible animals living in one of the world’s toughest places, deserts. With ground temperatures exceeding 70 degrees Celsius, to survive here creatures have developed some ingenious adaptations.

programme.title: Impossible Animals - Rainforests
programme.desc: Patrick Ayree introduces us to the Rainforest residents that have pushed their bodies to the limit, revealing some of the world’s most remarkable behaviours and adaptations.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants

programme.title: Panama's Animal Highway
programme.desc: Scientists use state-of-the-art technology to battle the conservation dangers threatening the millions of animals that migrate through Panama.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaska's rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

programme.title: Air Warriors - Ah- 64 Apache
programme.desc: Discover the inside story of the world’s premier attack helicopter, from its controversial beginnings to its triumphs against enemy forces. Highly maneuverable and heavily armed, the AH-64 Apache is one of the most trusted weapons in the sky

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of The Screen
programme.desc: Meet three actresses who became real-life princesses. Follow Grace Kelly, Gloria Swanson, and Rita Hayworth on their rise from Hollywood royalty to members of European nobility, which brought unparalleled glamour to the aristocracy.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of Culture
programme.desc: Meet the “Queens of Culture”: three empowered American princesses who blazed trails through the international arts world. See how Winnaretta Singer, Sara Murphy, and Peggy Guggenheim inspired some of the most innovative artists of the 20th century.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - 100-Point Game Ball
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Sports Detectives - Ali's Missing Gold Medal
programme.desc: A young Muhammad Ali clinched Olympic gold in 1960, but returned home to the same bigotry he’d left behind. Disillusioned, it’s said that he threw his medal into the Ohio River. Head to Kentucky and uncover the real story behind this legendary tale.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Contender
programme.desc: This episode explores the young Norma Jeane. While showing talent and audacity, she turned her back on her difficult childhood and put herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe - Siren
programme.desc: This episode explores Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude and how it catapults her to stardom.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum - EP3
programme.desc: Curators Steph and Jenny plan a major new exhibition celebrating the work of innovative British fashion designer Mary Quant who shook up women’s fashion in the 1960s with clothing that liberated women from decades of corsetry.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum - EP4
programme.desc: This week, we meet curators and conservators trying to preserve some of the finest examples of craftsmanship in the world.

programme.title: Seriously Amazing Objects S2 - Risk Takers
programme.desc: Discover objects used by some of history’s biggest risk-takers, including a daredevil spacesuit, a dress worn by a civil rights hero, and an artificial heart. Meet the trailblazers behind them and see the indelible mark they made on humankind.

programme.title: Seriously Amazing Objects S2 - Super Size
programme.desc: Join visitors for a behind-the-scenes tour of the Smithsonian’s super-sized objects. First, check out a 60-pound salamander, a 17-foot-long beard, and a fossilized 500-pound prehistoric sloth. Then learn how 22-foot-tall totem poles are carved.

programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.desc: The Dinosaur Echo is a documentary about the renaissance of paleontology in Canada today and what dinosaurs can teach us about climate change.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP11
programme.desc: It’s always so intriguing to discover the roots of a culture. We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.It’s always so intriguing to discover the roots of a culture. We track the history of African Americans around their fix-ins in gorgeous New Orleans.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP12
programme.desc: This moving trend is sweeping states and is taking the food to the people. We get on the bandwagon and taste the food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP13
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattle’s seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP14
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the world’s first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyoto
programme.desc: Adam meets a tea master, a Maiko, and a Michelin chef who turns risotto into sushi in the thriving traditional culture of Kyoto.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Osaka
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Kyushu And Shikoku
programme.desc: In Japan's southern islands of Kyushu and Shikoku, Adam Liaw finds a vibrant, warm culture where the cuisine is as fascinating as its people.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan - Okinawa
programme.desc: Adam ends his taste tour through Japan with a trip to the island of Okinawa, where he discovers an eclectic cuisine and learns the secret to long life.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wine Country
programme.desc: Warren is in the Franschhoek Valley, exploring the endless bounty of Boschendal Wine Estate.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Hidden Hermanus
programme.desc: Continuing to listen to his heart, Warren deepens his love of wine by venturing to the lesser known town of Hermanus, where he’ll visit Newton Johnson, the ‘wine farm with a view’.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Wild Kwa-Zulu Natal
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2 - Madikwe Safari
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.desc: Edward fakes a yeti attack to attract more listeners to his radio show, then he actually gets attacked by two yetis!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 20: The Bean Tree - EP20
programme.desc: When Lumpus discovers that he and Lazlo are related he reluctantly decides to leave camp Kidney to his least favorite camper.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 21: Taking Care Of Gretchen - EP21
programme.desc: Afraid of Gretchen, Lazlo hires Samson to 'take care of her' for him, but he is mortified to learn from a mob movie what that actually means!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 22: Scoop Of The Century - EP22
programme.desc: Lumpus becomes obsessed with reading Dave and Ping Pong newspaper even though it is 'for campers only'.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 23: Boxing Edward - EP23
programme.desc: Edward can't take another day of Lazlo's antics so he tries to mail himself out of Camp Kidney.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S3 24: Hold It Lazlo - EP24
programme.desc: After winning a lemonade-drinking contest, Lazlo can't find a place to pee!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 16: Knot Funny - EP16
programme.desc: Flapjack really wants to go to the knot festival, but his hands are tied. Or maybe KNOT!

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 17: Kid Nickels - EP17
programme.desc: K'nuckles gambles with the currency of friendship and Flapjack pays the price... at a bank?

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 18: The Sweet Life - EP18
programme.desc: A wealthy old lady wants to turn Flapjack into a proper young man.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 19: Pun Times With Punsie Mckale - EP19
programme.desc: What can Flapjack do when Punsy McHale comes to town? Just try and humor him.

programme.title: The Marvelous Misadventures Of Flapjack S1 20: Balance - EP20
programme.desc: How does Flapjack juggle both friendship and adventure? Well...it's a balancing act.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 16: Riding The Storm Out - EP16
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen's camping trip is interrupted by the emotionless Weatherheads. But a malfunctioning Omnitrix, firing out a mishmash of aliens, may not be the forecast for success.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 17: Need For Speed - EP17
programme.desc: Touring Yellowstone, Ben uncovers a plot by the fast and furious LaGrange to find treasure buried below the national park. But with Old Faithful's help, Overflow is able to douse LaGrange's dreams.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 18: Brief Career Of Lucky Girl - EP18
programme.desc: When a wizard cosplayer gets his hands on a real, magical wand at Comic Con, Ben enlists Gwen to help stop Hex from retrieving it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 19: Waterfilter - EP19
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max's trip to Niagara Falls is cut short by the horrid Hydromanders - creatures menacing them and their fellow tourists.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 20: Shhh! - EP20
programme.desc: While relaxing at a monastery with a no-noise policy, Ben can't keep quiet and accidentally awakens a dangerous dragon hidden in a secret chamber below the hallowed halls.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 28: Big Troubles - EP28
programme.desc: ALL MUSICAL - Bugs and a Snowman fight over who should get the carrot. No dialogue.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 29: Manner Maid - EP29
programme.desc: Bugs and Wile get skunked. Who has the better way to recover from such a smelly situation? It's nature versus SCIENCE! May the best man win!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 30: Bugsfoot - EP30
programme.desc: A Ghost visits Bugs and battles him for his bedsheet.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 31: Grim On Vacation - EP31
programme.desc: Bugs allows his house to get so dirty a giant Dust Bunny forms. When Bugs decides the house isn't big enough for the two of them, a battle ensues.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 32: Carrot Before The Horse - EP32
programme.desc: A computer virus invades Bugs' computer. Bugs goes inside the mainframe to fight him.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 33: Trunk With Power - EP33
programme.desc: Bugs mistakes the makeshift oil field of thieving oil tycoon Ivana for the Burning Man Festival. As she tries to make off with the oil, Bugs spoils all her fun.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 34: Snow Wabbit - EP34
programme.desc: Grim is after Bugs again. A chase ensues including power water and a lottery ticket

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 35: Aromatherapest - EP35
programme.desc: A terminator robot is sent to destroy Bugs. None of Bugs usual gags work. Michigan Frog is the mastermind

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S1 36: Raising Your Spirits - EP36
programme.desc: Slugsworthy bullies everyone at a waterpark. Bugs and squeaks fight for their rights.

programme.desc: An improper diagnosis in early childhood led Shibasaki Akane to spend nearly half her life in a world without words. We follow her as she expands her horizons and moves toward an independent future.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #20 Please don't put wasabi in. / To ask someone not to put something in your food or drink, say the name of the item, the particle "wa," and finally "irenaide kudasai."

programme.desc: Kyoto has many stores specializing in traditional snacks and treats, called Oyatsu. Some purveyors continue to use age-old ingredients and methods.

programme.title: NEWSLINE IN DEPTH
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: DESIGN MUSEUM JAPAN
programme.desc: Aichi / Kataoka Mami (curator) Tokoname, a pottery town with over 900 years of history, creates products appropriate for the times. Kataoka finds the beauty that's present in functional objects.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.desc: We look at the special factors that enable NHK WORLD-JAPAN to provide accurate, up-to-date information whenever a disaster strikes, including emergency reporting drills conducted by the news floor.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We introduce "Herbal Symphony," which shows an elderly couple who keeps a medical herbal garden in Nara Prefecture. The show presents them with beautiful scenery of 4 seasons.

programme.title: Origami Magic
programme.desc: Origami is magic made from a single sheet of paper. We introduce two artists who create unique paper "figures." And our origami expert "Dr. OrigamiI," will teach you how to make an easy origami craft.

programme.title: Direct Talk #019
programme.desc: Takahashi Moe was a member of the Japanese team that won the top prize at the 2023 Pastry World Cup. She reflects on the experience and talks about the desserts concocted by the team.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE
programme.desc: We observe "Red Fuji" and "Black Fuji," 2 dramatically different views of Japan's most famous mountain, captured by the artist Hokusai. What did Mount Fuji mean to the people of Edo?

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: An improper diagnosis in early childhood led Shibasaki Akane to spend nearly half her life in a world without words. We follow her as she expands her horizons and moves toward an independent future.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #20 Please don't put wasabi in. / To ask someone not to put something in your food or drink, say the name of the item, the particle "wa," and finally "irenaide kudasai."

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Kyoto has many stores specializing in traditional snacks and treats, called Oyatsu. Some purveyors continue to use age-old ingredients and methods.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: A vast expanse of drift ice spanning the frigid Sea of Okhotsk in the World Natural Heritage site of Shiretoko, sets the stage for a variety of novel winter adventures.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is complicated.

programme.title: First Ladies Revealed - The Power Of Style

programme.title: Haikal Nak Jadi Cef - EP 6
programme.desc: Haikal and Zaidi decide to create a dish together while Haikal's father is at work. The trouble begins when Haikal decides to use a blowtorch for the finishing touch. However, his inexperience gets the best of him, and the flame quickly spirals out of control, igniting the ingredients in a fiery blaze. Mr Tan, their neighbour, comes to the rescue and swiftly extinguishes the flames in time. Haikal is banned from lighting fire in the house unless Raian is around to supervise.

programme.title: Mama Drama Queen
programme.desc: Mama Drama Queen is a dramedy centering on two mid 40s friends, Rohana and Hayati. Both have made pacts with their respective husbands that they would return to the workforce once the youngest of their children had completed the all-important examination in a child's school calendar, Primary School Leaving Examination. (PSLE). But their return to the workforce, comes all kinds of challenges which they need to overcome.

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: It is 1941 and the world is in the throes of war. Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) wants to do his part and join America's armed forces, but the military rejects him because of his small stature. Finally, Steve gets his chance when he is accepted into an experimental program that turns him into a supersoldier called Captain America. Joining forces with Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell), Captain America leads the fight against the Nazi-backed HYDRA organization.

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: After the cataclysmic events in New York with his fellow Avengers, Steve Rogers, aka Captain America (Chris Evans), lives in the nation's capital as he tries to adjust to modern times. An attack on a S.H.I.E.L.D. colleague throws Rogers into a web of intrigue that places the whole world at risk. Joining forces with the Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and a new ally, the Falcon, Rogers struggles to expose an ever-widening conspiracy, but he and his team soon come up against an unexpected enemy.

programme.title: 911 Crisis Center
programme.desc: Supervisor Christine Mooch Muccino drives the shift through a series of crises including a fatal car accident and a horrific shooting in broad daylight, but nothing shakes her to the core more than when she learns of a crisis at home.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A vigilante group forms in response to a string of rapes; concerns over his wife's fidelity distract Amaro.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man goes on a killing spree, but he has links to a prostitute that Benson encountered in an earlier investigation, so the FBI contacts SVU for information.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a girl's disappearance leads to a high-tech kidnapper who uses the Internet to cover his tracks; Rollins reconnects with her sister.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a janitor violently attacks a coach, the SVU team connects the janitor's behavior to a history of sexual abuse; the detectives find more victims of the same predator -- including a prisoner (Mike Tyson) on death row.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: FBI Agent Dana Lewis partners with SVU when she thinks a 25-year-old rape-murder case in New York is connected to multiple unsolved cases across the country; as Lewis doggedly pursues her suspect, Benson and Amaro question his guilt.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Deeks and Kensi go under cover to investigate the murder of a homeless man -- who used to be a Marine and CIA agent -- they find a connection to a Mexican cartel.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Eric becomes one of seven suspects when Granger is poisoned by the mole; Hetty institutes a lockdown during the investigation.
